title: Remove drinks-per-day chart from Dashboard

requirements.text: Remove the 14-day drinks-per-day graph from the dashboard UI so the bar chart is no longer rendered on the Dashboard page.

quotes: ok, now we need to remove the graph showing number-of-drinks-per-day from the dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard no longer renders the <DrinksChart /> section (the "14-Day History" card is not visible).
Dashboard still loads and renders the remaining sections (UnifiedHeaderSection, ChanceOfDrinkingCard, CycleWindowCard, SoberDaysSection, StatusIndicatorsSection) without layout issues.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep the backend unchanged; remove only the dashboard graph UI.
nonGoals: Do not delete or refactor backend endpoints that provide 14-day history data.
Do not change other dashboard widgets or the daily check-in flow behavior.
